resources.string: "Bluetooth activation required for Wave connection, continue?"
"To give you the most accurate readings, please complete your personal info"
"Set your phone to silent mode when you change your Wave to sleep mode."
"Three double vibrations + five lights blinking in turn"
"When the Wave is far away from the phone, it will trigger the anti-loss alert (three double vibrations, five lights blinking in turn)."
"The Wave will be in sleep mode while phone in silent mode"
"The Wave battery level is lower than %s, please connect to the charger"
"Please turn on Bluetooth to pair with the Wave."
"Turn on Bluetooth to connect to the Wave?"
"Please try to bring the device closer to the phone, but away from other phones or Waves"
"Please keep away from other phones or Waves"
"Connection failed several times, possibly due to:"
"1. Wave is too far away from the phone"
"Tip: try to bring the Wave closer to the phone (within one metre)"
"2. Make sure there are no existing connections between other Waves/phones"
"Tip: keep the phone and Wave away from other devices"
"3. Wave battery level is lower than 60%"
"Tip: connect the Wave to the charger"
"Your Wave has been connected to another phone, reconnect?"
"Ensuring battery life, please make sure your Wave is at least 20% charged."
"Find the Wave and tap it twice"
"Please connect your Wave to the charger"
"Incoming calls from the chosen contacts will be muted or rejected in the Wave"
"Please set the accessibility for receive notifications on your Smartband"
"Please wear the Wave on your weak hand."
"Quickly tap the Wave six times in a row."
"Touch to show summary only. To change modes, please tap your Wave six times until it vibrates once and the lights flash."
"New version has existed in local storage, please install it manually."
"Quickly tap the Wave six times in a row."
"Check the summary between active and sleep mode"
"Six double vibrations + five lights blinking in turn"
"When charging the Wave, gently poke a sharp object in the reset hole. You will see the lights blinking. All data will be removed."
"Insert the Wave core in the charger. Please make sure that the icons on the charger match those on the Wave core."
"Press the back key again to exit the application!"
"Vibrate if you are not activity in one hour under active mode"
"Make a SOS call when in Emengercy Situation"
"You must turn on NFC to scan tags."
"Reading will begin when you tap an NFC compatible item with the back of your device."
"Modify the sequence of menu on Wave Life"
"Blocking your Wave Life. No disturb on it"
"A new devices triyng to pair with Wave Life! Previous data will be lost"
"Sync data to cloud,of course this operating need contect network"
"Sync data to cloud only with wifi opened"
"Request server time out,please refresh or try again later"
"You need to create an account first"
"Please check your new e-mail from your registered mail"
"Sign in if you already have an account"
"Send reset email if you forgot password"
"When my phone receive find me signal"
Please set the Cu reference firstly
Put Device and Phone into Box within 5s

Write bluetooth address to Nfc tag fail.
nfc tag data is null,please do write NFC first!
Tag has been encrypted,can not write bt address to nfc,please decrypt first.
Set name of the target device.
Set min rssi value to be detected.
Reset(disable/enable) to set curef before testing.
Reset(disable/enable) to set rom before testing.
Preset device name to be detected
Preset rom version to be detected
0 or others for MMI test, 1 for Packing test
Place a barcode inside the viewfinder rectangle to scan it.
Sorry, the Android camera encountered a problem. You may need to restart the device.
Timeout! Can not connect to the device.

Press next to continue next test,press exit to end test

Android 6.0 requires Location services to be turned on in order to search for and connect your Watch with your device.
